__data__.text:
Below are the steps for Lab 1, Lab 2, and Lab 3.
Lab 1: Verifying Lab Connectivity

Objective:
Connect to the oob-mgmt-server
Run the setup playbook

Instructions:

1. Connect to the oob-mgmt-server:
   - Open a terminal window.
   - SSH into the oob-mgmt-server using the following command:
     ```
     ssh ubuntu@oob-mgmt-server
     ```
   - Enter the password when prompted (password: nvidia).

2. Change directories to the Test-Drive-Automation folder:
   ```
   cd Test-Drive-Automation
   ```

3. Perform a git pull to sync/fetch changes:
   ```
   git pull
   ```

4. Run the start-lab.yml Ansible playbook:
   ```
   ansible-playbook start-lab.yml
   ```

Lab 2: Interface Configuration

Objective:
Configure loopback addresses, bond, bridge, access ports, SVIs, and VRR on leaf01 and leaf02.

Instructions:

1. Configure loopback addresses on leaf01 and leaf02:
   ```
   nv set interface lo ip address 10.255.255.1/32
   nv config apply
   ```

   ```
   nv set interface lo ip address 10.255.255.2/32
   nv config apply
   ```

2. Configure bond between leaf01 and leaf02:
   ```
   nv set interface bond0 bond member swp49-50
   nv config apply
   ```

3. Configure bridge and access ports on leaf01:
   ```
   nv set bridge domain br_default vlan 10,20
   nv set interface swp1,bond0 bridge domain br_default
   nv set interface swp1 bridge domain br_default access 10
   nv config apply
   ```

4. Configure bridge and access ports on leaf02:
   ```
   nv set bridge domain br_default vlan 10,20
   nv set interface swp2,bond0 bridge domain br_default
   nv set interface swp2 bridge domain br_default access 20
   nv config apply
   ```

5.

Configure bond between leaf01 and leaf02:
   ```
   nv set interface bond0 bond member swp49-50
   nv config apply
   ```

3. Configure bridge and access ports on leaf01:
   ```
   nv set bridge domain br_default vlan 10,20
   nv set interface swp1,bond0 bridge domain br_default
   nv set interface swp1 bridge domain br_default access 10
   nv config apply
   ```

4. Configure bridge and access ports on leaf02:
   ```
   nv set bridge domain br_default vlan 10,20
   nv set interface swp2,bond0 bridge domain br_default
   nv set interface swp2 bridge domain br_default access 20
   nv config apply
   ```

5. Configure SVIs and VRR on leaf01 and leaf02:
   ```
   nv set interface vlan10 ip address 10.0.10.2/24
   nv set interface vlan20 ip address 10.0.20.2/24
   nv set interface vlan10 ip vrr address 10.0.10.1/24
   nv set interface vlan10 ip vrr mac-address 00:00:00:00:1a:10
   nv set interface vlan10 ip vrr state up
   nv set interface vlan20 ip vrr address 10.0.20.1/24
   nv set interface vlan20 ip vrr mac-address 00:00:00:00:1a:20
   nv set interface vlan20 ip vrr state up
   nv config apply
   ```

Lab 3: FRR & BGP Unnumbered

Objective:
Configure BGP unnumbered between spine01, leaf01, and leaf02.

Instructions:

1. Apply loopback address to spine01:
   ```
   nv set interface lo ip address 10.255.255.101/32
   nv config apply
   ```

2.

Instructions:

1. Apply loopback address to spine01:
   ```
   nv set interface lo ip address 10.255.255.101/32
   nv config apply
   ```

2. Configure BGP unnumbered on spine01:
   ```
   nv set vrf default router bgp autonomous-system 65201
   nv set vrf default router bgp path-selection multipath aspath-ignore on
   nv set router bgp router-id 10.255.255.101
   nv set vrf default router bgp neighbor swp1 remote-as external
   nv set vrf default router bgp neighbor swp2 remote-as external
   nv config apply
   ```

3. Configure BGP unnumbered on leaf01:
   ```
   nv set vrf default router bgp autonomous-system 65101
   nv set vrf default router bgp path-selection multipath aspath-ignore on
   nv set router bgp router-id 10.255.255.1
   nv set vrf default router bgp neighbor swp1 remote-as external
   nv config apply
   ```

4. Configure BGP unnumbered on leaf02:
   ```
   nv set vrf default router bgp autonomous-system 65102
   nv set vrf default router bgp path-selection multipath aspath-ignore on
   nv set router bgp router-id 10.255.255.2
   nv set vrf default router bgp neighbor swp1 remote-as external
   nv config apply
   ```

5. Add BGP unnumbered configuration to establish peering between spine01, leaf01, and leaf02:

```plaintext
nv set vrf default router bgp neighbor swp1 interface peering
nv set vrf default router bgp neighbor swp2 interface peering
nv set vrf default router bgp neighbor swp3 interface peering
nv config apply
```

6.

Configure BGP unnumbered on leaf02:
   ```
   nv set vrf default router bgp autonomous-system 65102
   nv set vrf default router bgp path-selection multipath aspath-ignore on
   nv set router bgp router-id 10.255.255.2
   nv set vrf default router bgp neighbor swp1 remote-as external
   nv config apply
   ```

5. Add BGP unnumbered configuration to establish peering between spine01, leaf01, and leaf02:

```plaintext
nv set vrf default router bgp neighbor swp1 interface peering
nv set vrf default router bgp neighbor swp2 interface peering
nv set vrf default router bgp neighbor swp3 interface peering
nv config apply
```

6. Verify BGP peering status:

On spine01:
```plaintext
show ip bgp summary
```

On leaf01:
```plaintext
show ip bgp summary
```

On leaf02:
```plaintext
show ip bgp summary
```

Ensure that BGP sessions are established between spine01, leaf01, and leaf02.
